name: Twin GO
description:
Twin GO is an action-runner mobile game where the player controls two characters who share a single sword. You must make them pass the sword at each other at the right moments to defeat your enemies.

The PC version is a debug build, the game was designed to be played on mobile. 

Input 

  • Attack : Space / Touch
  • Throw sword : Up arrow / Swipe

Team:

Alice Fernandez - Concept, Characters , UI

Alexandre Villiers-Moriamé - Concepts, Texturing, UI, Rig

Chloé Hornoy - Characters, Texturing

Alex Ryan - Environment, Animations

Vincent Trinel - 3C/AI Programming, Game Design

Guilhem d'Humières - Game Design, Level Design, Sound

Nicolas Ceriani - VFX/Tech art, System Programming, Animations
